   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(ssh_sup_SUITE).
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include("ssh.hrl").
   25: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -export([
   28:          suite/0,
   29:          all/0,
   30:          groups/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          init_per_group/2,
   34:          end_per_group/2,
   35:          init_per_testcase/2,
   36:          end_per_testcase/2
   37:         ]).
   38: 
   39: -export([
   40:          default_tree/1,
   41:          killed_acceptor_restarts/1,
   42:          shell_channel_tree/1,
   43:          sshc_subtree/1,
   44:          sshd_subtree/1,
   45:          sshd_subtree_profile/1
   46:         ]).
   47: 
   48: -define(USER, "Alladin").
   49: -define(PASSWD, "Sesame").
   50: 
   51: -define(WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN, 500).
   52: 
   53: -define(SSHC_SUP(Pid), {sshc_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   54: -define(SSHD_SUP(Pid), {sshd_sup, Pid, supervisor, [supervisor]}).
   55: -define(SYSTEM_SUP(Pid,Address), {{ssh_system_sup, Address}, Pid, supervisor,[ssh_system_sup]}).
   56: -define(SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(Pid), {_,Pid, supervisor,[ssh_subsystem_sup]}).
   57: -define(ACCEPTOR_SUP(Pid,Address), {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,supervisor,[ssh_acceptor_sup]}).
   58: -define(ACCEPTOR_WORKER(Pid,Address), {{ssh_acceptor_sup,Address},Pid,worker,[ssh_acceptor]}).
   59: 
   60: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   61: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: 
   64: suite() ->
   65:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   66:      {timetrap,{seconds,100}}].
   67: 
   68: all() -> 
   69:     [default_tree, sshc_subtree, sshd_subtree, sshd_subtree_profile,
   70:      killed_acceptor_restarts,
   71:      shell_channel_tree
   72:     ].
   73: 
   74: groups() -> 
   75:     [].
   76: 
   77: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   78:     Config.
   79: 
   80: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   81:     Config.
   82: 
   83: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   84:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
   85:        begin
   86: 	   PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
   87: 	   UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
   88: 	   file:make_dir(UserDir),
   89: 	   [{userdir, UserDir} | Config]
   90:        end).
   91: 
   92: end_per_suite(_) ->
   93:     ok.
   94: 
   95: init_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->  
   96:     ssh:start(),
   97:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   98:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
   99: 					      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  100: 					      {user_passwords,
  101: 					       [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
  102:     [{server, {Pid, Host, Port}} | Config];
  103: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  104:     end_per_testcase(Case, Config),
  105:     ssh:start(),
  106:     Config.
  107: end_per_testcase(sshc_subtree, Config) ->
  108:     {Pid,_,_} = proplists:get_value(server, Config), 
  109:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
  110:     ssh:stop();
  111: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
  112:     ssh:stop().
  113: 
  114: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: %% Test cases 
  116: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  117: default_tree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     TopSupChildren = supervisor:which_children(ssh_sup),
  119:     2 = length(TopSupChildren),
  120:     {value, ?SSHC_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshc_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  121:     {value, ?SSHD_SUP(_)} = lists:keysearch(sshd_sup, 1, TopSupChildren),
  122:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  123:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  124: 
  125: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  126: sshc_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
  128:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  129: 
  130:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  131: 
  132:     Pid1 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  133:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  134: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  135: 					  {user, ?USER}, {password, ?PASSWD},{user_dir, UserDir}]),
  136: 
  137:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(SysSup, #address{address=LocalIP, port=LocalPort, profile=?DEFAULT_PROFILE})
  138:                 ],
  139: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup),
  140:                 [SysSup, LocalIP, LocalPort]),
  141:     check_sshc_system_tree(SysSup, Pid1, LocalIP, LocalPort, Config),
  142: 
  143:     Pid2 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  144:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  145: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  146: 					  {user, ?USER}, {password, ?PASSWD}, {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  147:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(_,_),
  148:                  ?SYSTEM_SUP(_,_)
  149:                 ],
  150: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  151: 
  152:     ssh:close(Pid1),
  153:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(_,_)
  154:                 ],
  155: 		supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)),
  156:     ssh:close(Pid2),
  157:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshc_sup)).
  158: 
  159: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  160: sshd_subtree(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  161:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  162:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  163:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  164:                                                   {user_passwords,
  165:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]}]),
  166: 
  167:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Daemon]),
  168:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP, port=Port, profile=?DEFAULT_PROFILE})
  169:                 ],
  170: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  171: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  172:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  173:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  174:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port),
  175:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  176:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  177: 
  178: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  179: sshd_subtree_profile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  180:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config), 
  181:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  182: 
  183:     {Daemon, HostIP, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  184:                                                   {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  185:                                                   {user_passwords,
  186:                                                    [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  187:                                                   {profile, Profile}]),
  188:     ct:log("Expect HostIP=~p, Port=~p, Profile=~p, Daemon=~p",[HostIP,Port,Profile,Daemon]),
  189:     ?wait_match([?SYSTEM_SUP(Daemon, #address{address=ListenIP,port=Port,profile=Profile})
  190:                 ],
  191: 		supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  192: 		[ListenIP,Daemon]),
  193:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(HostIP, ListenIP),
  194:     check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, HostIP, Port, Config),
  195:     ssh:stop_daemon(HostIP, Port, Profile),
  196:     ct:sleep(?WAIT_FOR_SHUTDOWN),
  197:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup)).
  198: 
  199: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  200: killed_acceptor_restarts(Config) ->
  201:     Profile = proplists:get_value(profile, Config), 
  202:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  203:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  204:     {ok, DaemonPid} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  205:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  206:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  207:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  208: 
  209:     {ok, DaemonPid2} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  210:                                      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  211:                                      {user_passwords, [{?USER, ?PASSWD}]},
  212:                                      {profile, Profile}]),
  213: 
  214:     Port  = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid),
  215:     Port2 = ssh_test_lib:daemon_port(DaemonPid2),
  216:     true = (Port /= Port2),
  217: 
  218:     {ok,[{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  219:     {ok,[{AccPid2,ListenAddr,Port2}]} = acceptor_pid(DaemonPid2),
  220: 
  221:     true = (AccPid /= AccPid2),
  222: 
  223:     %% Connect first client and check it is alive:
  224:     C1 = ssh_test_lib:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  225:                                                    {save_accepted_host, false},
  226:                                               {user_interaction, false},
  227:                                               {user, ?USER},
  228:                                               {password, ?PASSWD},
  229:                                               {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  230:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  231: 
  232:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  233: 
  234:     %% Make acceptor restart:
  235:     ct:pal("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [AccPid]),
  236:     exit(AccPid, kill),
  237:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(AccPid)),
  238: 
  239:     %% Check it is a new acceptor and wait if it is not:
  240:     ?wait_match({ok,[{AccPid1,ListenAddr,Port}]}, AccPid1=/=AccPid,
  241:                 acceptor_pid(DaemonPid),
  242:                 AccPid1,
  243:                 500, 30),
  244: 
  245:     ct:pal("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []),
  246: 
  247:     true = (AccPid1 =/= AccPid2),
  248: 
  249:     %% Connect second client and check it is alive:
  250:     C2 =
  251:         case ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  252:                                              {save_accepted_host, false},
  253:                                              {user_interaction, false},
  254:                                              {user, ?USER},
  255:                                              {password, ?PASSWD},
  256:                                              {user_dir, UserDir}]) of
  257:             {ok,_C2} ->
  258:                 _C2;
  259:             _Other ->
  260:                 ct:log("new connect failed: ~p~n~n~s",[_Other,lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  261:                 ct:fail("Re-connect failed!", [])
  262:         end,
  263: 
  264:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  265:     
  266:     ct:log("~s",[lists:flatten(ssh_info:string())]),
  267: 
  268:     %% Check first client is still alive:
  269:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  270:     
  271:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid2),
  272:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid2), 1000, 30),
  273:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]),
  274:     [{client_version,_}] = ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]),
  275:     
  276:     ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonPid),
  277:     ?wait_match(undefined, process_info(DaemonPid), 1000, 30),
  278:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C1,[client_version]), 1000, 5),
  279:     ?wait_match({error,closed}, ssh:connection_info(C2,[client_version]), 1000, 5).
  280: 
  281: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  282: shell_channel_tree(Config) ->
  283:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  284:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
  285:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  286:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  287:     TimeoutShell =
  288:         fun() ->
  289:                 io:format("TimeoutShell started!~n",[]),
  290:                 timer:sleep(5000),
  291:                 ct:log("~p TIMEOUT!",[self()])
  292:         end,
  293:     {Daemon, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  294:                                                 {user_dir, UserDir},
  295:                                                 {password, "morot"},
  296:                                                 {shell, fun(_User) ->
  297:                                                                 spawn(TimeoutShell)
  298:                                                         end
  299:                                                 }
  300:                                             ]),
  301:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  302: 						      {user, "foo"},
  303: 						      {password, "morot"},
  304: 						      {user_interaction, true},
  305: 						      {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  306: 
  307:     [SubSysSup,_ChPid|_] = Sups0 = chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  308:     
  309:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  310:     ok = ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef,ChannelId0),
  311:     success = ssh_connection:ptty_alloc(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0, [{pty_opts,[{onlcr,1}]}]),
  312: 
  313:     ?wait_match([{_,_, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  314:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  315:                  {connection,_,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  316:                 ],
  317: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  318:                 [ChSup]),
  319:     ?wait_match([{_,GroupPid,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}
  320:                 ],
  321:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  322:                 [GroupPid]),
  323: 
  324: 
  325:     {links,GroupLinks} = erlang:process_info(GroupPid, links),
  326:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, GroupLinks = ~p Sups0 = ~p",[GroupPid,GroupLinks,Sups0]),
  327:     [ShellPid] = GroupLinks--[ChSup],
  328:     ct:log("GroupPid = ~p, ShellPid = ~p",[GroupPid,ShellPid]),
  329: 
  330:     receive
  331:         {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"TimeoutShell started!",Rest/binary>>}} ->
  332:             ct:log("TimeoutShell started. Rest = ~p", [Rest]),
  333:             receive
  334:                 %%---- wait for the subsystem to terminate
  335:                 {ssh_cm,ConnectionRef,{closed,ChannelId0}} ->
  336:                     ct:log("Subsystem terminated",[]),
  337:                     case {chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon),
  338:                           process_info(GroupPid),
  339:                           process_info(ShellPid)} of
  340:                         {Sups0, undefined, undefined} ->
  341:                             %% SUCCESS
  342:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon);
  343:                         {Sups0, _, undefined}  ->
  344:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  345:                             ct:fail("Group proc lives!");
  346:                         {Sups0, undefined, _}  ->
  347:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  348:                             ct:fail("Shell proc lives!");
  349:                         _ ->
  350:                             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  351:                             ct:fail("Sup tree changed!")
  352:                     end
  353:             after 10000 ->
  354:                     ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  355:                     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  356:                     ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  357:                     ct:fail("CLI Timeout 1")
  358:             end
  359:     after 10000 ->
  360:             ct:log("~p:~p  Flush unexpected: ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,flush_rest()]),
  361:             ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  362:             ssh:stop_daemon(Daemon),
  363:             ct:fail("CLI Timeout 2")
  364:     end.
  365: 
  366: chk_empty_con_daemon(Daemon) ->
  367:     ?wait_match([?SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(SubSysSup),
  368: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)
  369:                 ],
  370: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  371:                 [SubSysSup,AccSup]),
  372:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  373:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  374:                  {connection,ServerConnPid,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}                 
  375:                 ],
  376: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  377: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup,ServerConnPid]),
  378:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  379:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  380:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)],
  381:                 supervisor:which_children(AccSup),
  382:                 []),
  383:     [SubSysSup, ChSup, ServerConnPid, AccSup, FwdAccSup].
  384: 
  385: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  386: %% Help functions
  387: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  388: check_sshd_system_tree(Daemon, Host, Port, Config) -> 
  389:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(userdir, Config),
  390:     ClientConn = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  391:                                                 {user_interaction, false},
  392:                                                 {user, ?USER},
  393:                                                 {password, ?PASSWD},
  394:                                                 {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  395:     
  396:     ?wait_match([?SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(SubSysSup),
  397: 		 ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSup,_)
  398:                 ],
  399: 		supervisor:which_children(Daemon),
  400:                 [SubSysSup,AccSup]),
  401:     
  402:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  403:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  404:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  405:                 ],
  406: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  407: 		[FwdAccSup,ServerConn]),
  408:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  409: 
  410:     ?wait_match([?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(_,_)],
  411: 		supervisor:which_children(AccSup)),
  412:     
  413:     
  414:     {ok,PidC} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ClientConn),
  415:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  416:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  417:                  {connection,ServerConn,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  418:                 ],
  419: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  420: 		[ChSup,ServerConn]),
  421: 
  422:     ?wait_match([{_,PidS,worker,[ssh_server_channel]}],
  423:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  424:                 [PidS]),
  425:     true = (PidS =/= PidC),
  426:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  427: 
  428:     ssh:close(ClientConn).
  429: 
  430: 
  431: check_sshc_system_tree(SysSup, Connection, _LocalIP, _LocalPort, _Config) ->
  432:     ?wait_match([?SUB_SYSTEM_SUP(SubSysSup)],
  433:                 supervisor:which_children(SysSup),
  434:                 [SubSysSup]),
  435:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  436:                  {_,_,supervisor,[ssh_channel_sup]},
  437:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  438:                 ],
  439: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  440: 		[FwdAccSup]),
  441:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(FwdAccSup)),
  442: 
  443:     {ok,ChPid1} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  444:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  445:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  446:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  447:                 ],
  448: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  449: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  450:     
  451:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  452:                 ],
  453:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  454:                 [ChPid1]),
  455: 
  456:     {ok,ChPid2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(Connection),
  457:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  458:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  459:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  460:                 ],
  461: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  462: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  463: 
  464:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]},
  465:                  {_,ChPid1,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  466:                 ],
  467:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  468:                 [ChPid1,ChPid2]),
  469: 
  470:     ct:pal("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid1]),
  471:     exit(ChPid1, kill),
  472:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  473:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  474:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  475:                 ],
  476: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  477: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  478: 
  479:     ?wait_match([{_,ChPid2,worker,[ssh_client_channel]}
  480:                 ],
  481:                 supervisor:which_children(ChSup),
  482:                 [ChPid2]),
  483: 
  484:     ct:pal("Expect a SUPERVISOR REPORT with offender {pid,~p}....~n", [ChPid2]),
  485:     exit(ChPid2, kill),
  486:     ?wait_match([{_,FwdAccSup, supervisor,[ssh_tcpip_forward_acceptor_sup]},
  487:                  {_,ChSup,supervisor, [ssh_channel_sup]},
  488:                  {connection,Connection,worker,[ssh_connection_handler]}
  489:                 ],
  490: 		supervisor:which_children(SubSysSup),
  491: 		[ChSup,FwdAccSup]),
  492: 
  493:     ?wait_match([], supervisor:which_children(ChSup)),
  494: 
  495:     ct:pal("... now there should not be any SUPERVISOR REPORT.~n", []).
  496: 
  497: 
  498: 
  499: acceptor_pid(DaemonPid) ->
  500:     Parent = self(),
  501:     Pid = spawn(fun() ->
  502:                         Parent ! {self(), supsearch,
  503:                                   [{AccPid,ListenAddr,Port}
  504: 
  505:                                    || ?SYSTEM_SUP(DPid,#address{address=ListenAddr,port=Port,profile=NS})
  506:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(sshd_sup),
  507:                                       DPid == DaemonPid,
  508: 
  509:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_SUP(AccSupPid,_)
  510:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(DaemonPid),
  511: 
  512:                                       ?ACCEPTOR_WORKER(AccPid, #address{address=L2,
  513:                                                                         port=P2,
  514:                                                                         profile=NS2})
  515:                                           <- supervisor:which_children(AccSupPid),
  516:                                       L2 == ListenAddr,
  517:                                       P2 == Port,
  518:                                       NS2 == NS]}
  519:                 end),
  520:     receive {Pid, supsearch, L} -> {ok,L}
  521:     after 2000 -> timeout
  522:     end.
  523: 
  524: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  525: flush_rest() -> lists:reverse(flush_rest([])).
  526: 
  527: flush_rest(Acc) ->
  528:     receive Any -> [Any|Acc]
  529:     after 0 -> Acc
  530:     end.
